Text: Thanks mate! Been waiting all day for this one. Thanks for keeping the files small too.
Thanks for this and for the XVID format.
Thankyou, loved it so far this season, i appreciate you helping those who love formula 1 and just can't afford sky
Thank you, please keep them F1 Vids coming!
Thank You. You ARE the man!
Thanks Footy and everyone at The Box!
Thanks again from the deepest part of Canada.  You are my only link to F1.

Thanks for all the hard work Brother.
Us here in North America have a rough time watching F1 Qually and Races, and can forget watching the FP Sessions unless we depend on our UK F1 Brothers. 
I know how much time and effort go in to this so THANKS.
And good job on the commercial cuts, you almost get the music sync dead on when you cut back in..
Cheers.
